column5: Hit the water saturday to take some buddies out, thought I would head out to the Blue zone for some rainbows. Water was plenty rough out there could only troll east with the wind. Went 13/14 with a mix of small kings and bows. white/blue spinny with a skiens machine fly caught most off the rigger 55ft down. Sunday went out again, looked like a nicer morning. Got out to the BZ and the waves picked up again could only troll one way South. Hit a bow right away 22ft down before we could get the rods all down. picked up 2 more and lossed 2, one was a hugh bow that was peeling line.Water got too rough so we pulled up and headed into Port C. Fished 125-30fow, lots of bait but not many fish. Manged 2 bows off a green glow frog spoon.  heres a few pics of my buddies and a group pic infront of my new boat! Cant wait for the big water next year!!!!  Ryan         My buddies first fish out riggin'    they did let me reel in one!    The new Boat and a few fish for the smoker
Nice report and congrads on all the fish caught!
Despite the rough water you boys did good, cool boat ya could stay out for a couple days with that...
Great report and pics troutguy  Looks like you guys had a blast out there and congratulation on your new boat.....Very nice  Thanks for sharing Leechman
Sounds like a helluva day,  congrats on the new boat,looks like it could fit 1 more guy   cheers Streamerguy
wow nice catches  boat is lookin sweet too
Man, are those rainbows ever nice looking!!!....they look so clean!...Congrats on that kick-azz boat you got there troutguy...she's a real beauty
